knimeNode.name: Replacer
knimeNode.shortDescription: Replaces pattern in terms matching the specified regular expression.

fullDescription.intro: Replaces all pattern in all terms matching the specified regular expression with the specified replacement.
fullDescription.option: Specifies the regular expression to find matching pattern to replace.
Specifies the replacement to replace matching pattern with.
Specifies the column containing the documents to preprocess.
If deep preprocessing is checked, the terms contained inside the documents are converted too, this means that the documents are changed, which is more time consuming.

If append original document is checked, the documents contained in the input document column are appended as extra column. This enables later on a mapping of preprocessed documents to original documents.

inPort.name: Terms and related documents input table

ports.inPort: The input table which contains the terms to convert.

outPort.name: Filtered terms and related documents output table

ports.outPort: The output table which contains the preprocessed terms.
